description: This file defines a workflow class 'TeamWorkflow' for a content aggregation and reporting system. It orchestrates agents for researching top stories from Hacker News and Reddit, coordinates a team to gather research results, and a writer agent to generate a comprehensive report based on the collected links and articles.

classes.name: TeamWorkflow
classes.description: A workflow class that manages the process of researching top stories from Hacker News and Reddit, and generating a report based on the findings.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow: coordinates team research and report generation, yields responses.
